name: gatsby-plugin-transition-link
description: A link component for page transitions in gatsby.
author: Tyler Barnes <tyler@known.design>

scripts.copy-files: mkdir lib || true && cp .eslintrc.json readme.md package.json lib
scripts.publish-repo: yarn copy-files && cd lib && npm publish && cd ../
scripts.publish-patch: yarn prepare-files && npx json-bump --patch=1 package.json && yarn publish-repo
scripts.publish-minor: yarn prepare-files && npx json-bump --minor=1 package.json && yarn publish-repo
scripts.publish-major: yarn prepare-files && npx json-bump --major=1 package.json && yarn publish-repo
